title: The Ball
description: This is an alternate cover edition of ASIN B07T8KQFVBAlyson Jenkins stumbled upon a forbidden world, one that awoke something deep inside of her.She’s yearned for her step-brother, Max, wanted, and loved him for years, even though he’s in a committed relationship with Victor.After Alyson’s works up the courage to go to the local sex club, The Ball, everything changes. Max and his submissive Victor take Alyson through sexual exploration in the club, exposing desires and fulfilling fantasies. She is pulled into their hidden life where the whip of a flogger sounds like a promise and an order drives her wild.The Ball holds dark temptations, erotic promises, and maybe the life Alyson always wanted. Can she submit to her heart’s desire, or will she crumble under the pressure of everything she’s desired?The twisted, erotic retelling of Grimm Brother’s Cinderella, will leave you gasping for more.
author: Layna Snow
